subject: Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: The world-record holder Paula Radcliffe of England will run in the Berlin Marathon in September, her first race at that distance in nearly two years, in an attempt to qualify for the 2012 London Olympics.
snippet: The world-record holder Paula Radcliffe of England will run in the Berlin Marathon in September, her first race at that distance in nearly two years, in an attempt to qualify for the 2012 London Olympics.
